name: Smart MCP Agent
description: A context-aware agent that manages and executes workflows using the Model Context Protocol (MCP) and interacts with other agents via the Agent2Agent (A2A) protocol.

capabilities.name: workflow_execution
capabilities.description: Executes predefined workflows based on task descriptions.

task_description.description: A natural language description of the task to be performed.

workflowId.description: The ID of the workflow that will be executed.

context.description: Initial context for the workflow execution.
